response.overview: They may not necessarily be Irish, but these three lucky bastards have just struck the goldmine! Why? Because the tables have turned and the odds are now in favor of pussy galore when they find themselves the center of attention in a reverse gang-bang! It will take a lot of hard work, but these fifteen girls are buns up for the challenge "Lassie" style and with a little luck, they will all get a little Irish in them! Over 2 hours with 3 gangbangs and 15 girls!
response.title: Lucky Bastard 3
